feed.title: Lidarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 2.2.5.4141
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.

Changes:

  • 3071977284bf0a158b0fd0ca74c24fccd7f15214 Add DevContainer, VSCode config and extensions.json [ #4740 ]
  • b14e2bb6180c22c60fb795fc455708d5a470d5a0 New: Auto tag artists based on tags present/absent on artists [ #4742 ]
  • 8c09c0cb5c8801bb9dac699315d9a2ffa4e177e6 New: Option to prefix app name on Telegram notification titles [ #4739 ]
  • 8cebb21c2d4eb2100e2ce7dd315ad18656b772da Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 74ac263b7435325c0e2329e5026ef1d7ab4a0751 New: Detect shfs mounts in disk space
  • adcec90ef81c48a596d6fcb21c9aeecd1b0ce5be Fixed: Sorting by Artist Name in Missing/Cutoff Unmet under Postgres [ #4736, #3392, #4374 ]
  • daf8b94c8e95a53823640532cb6050855881114c Added table identifier to OrderBy to avoid column ambiguity on joins [ #3993 ]
  • 7c4f0c597efe077a2c848d9c00c10da989fd167d Bump version to 2.2.5
  • 1d2af2aab4474d05501dd7cf3044a96e64561300 Fix translation for indexer priority help text
  • 5d537689fba07d8252b49c92189bc745971daa87 New: Informational text on Custom Formats modal [ #4729 ]
See More * ca6beea62bc11afd8b1b1aee2d11b12c44de09cb Fixed: Use widely supported display mode for PWA * a82c9190936d05416a56b9757a1d90f3d2ce7b7d Fixed: Cleanse BHD RSS key in log files * 2941e0c4b7fdbe50bc1464744d9dc2a047b766d1 Fixed: Sending ntfy.sh notifications with unicode characters * ca0b900d928ccb4c1e5d256fc7f8dab0d259901f Fixed: (Gazelle) Ignore ineligible releases with Use Freeleech Token * 72f1b2075b8472628707035e30bf5e83161ad716 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * e847828191bcc57444cd20fb432264742328bfbf Fixed: Album release selection in manual import * 2a10505dff0ec398e9052fc82404f8e76e4246e6 Bump skipping spotify tests * 28f2eb974d72148e79b388e11be0edc78d95a870 Fixed: Task with removed artists causing error [ #4696 ] * 13ce040e4d0e9a12be58dcf55df0d6c7c643a009 Automated API Docs update * f477f9b287733fcda58174d05505fcc84a4dca6b Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 0e840086691de70c9f97ec1583f8d52963163542 New: Advanced settings toggle in import list, notification and download client modals * 52b5ff6fddbe0ae19172786fa8cf4af9a7a2cd4a Fixed: Exceptions when checking for routable IPv4 addresses * 1d0de5191782e756486b223d6220f479a6fa7185 Fixed: qBittorrent not correctly handling retention during testing * a8648fdb71046f188b75dc18f2b638ad0ab88d2a Fixed: Handling torrents with relative path in rTorrent * f890a8c18fcca0616123a5a1d7b4cc5d6e87543a New: Allow HEAD requests to ping endpoint * e730cf6307f5c50c36c38f537d970ee3b7df96aa Fixed: Task progress messages in the UI [ #4689 ] * 9f4d821a2d8abc11afd49f9c1f20a2f978c7452e Bump version to 2.2.4 * ce6e4555ecc234cf143ee9ba4359a2ab87f7b277 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 55eaecb3c8af6c6d36b90f31c5860880dd101097 Fixed: Disabled select option still selectable [ #4679 ] * 63e36f71d2fe14f23cb8f05551a792a6379fecf6 Ensure not allowed cursor is shown for disabled select inputs * 89e184e768d5376821954e389db9383561bbba76 Ensure artists are populated in PageConnector * 873a225f0c76406bedda4a30e9c70067d5ea8340 New: Show artist names after task name when applicable [ #4678 ] * b81170d9117daff1125932be70ffc677ff66b52e Fixed: Wrapping of naming tokens with alternate separators [ #4561, #4677 ] * 5ffde4032058347e11909874525545980677b819 Automated API Docs update * ebfa68087d702bc4a91664e06a594285d40b2f0a Fixed: Release push with only Magnet URL * 1db0eb1029153207ab2ceefba23fc5e338c9ea0f New: Indexer flags * 967b58017aee4bc2292f5a83e089005834df0530 Bump ImageSharp, Polly * 3754d611c78b20cbf34ca1485ee3b19d0f4169e0 Bump version to 2.2.3 * 8035d4202f4f05bb62c30d57aa34c51c0c75393c Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 468f3acf85e1326c5e196fbd23db468470b8cd07 Translations for InteractiveSearchRow [ #4077 ] * 29c77ec3a1c89d949e4988020e8f8fcab8d1ae7a Fix version in namespace for AutoTagging * d04bb5333afe0cbd8fe7c867e2ae0bc0b8d2156d Fixed: Matching of custom formats during track files import [ #3484 ] * 0d76fbcf0dfa38ba38670ae47425410c36d992d4 New: XXL modal size * 3df140b1f03a0d09fdc4835b763e4303eae7808a Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 340ae78f466c7db962e2681cbd9cd84080f0a89f Prevent NullRef in naming when truncating a null Release Group * 881fabad93004192ce4364d1b4bf9f2b47c56c8d Fixed: WebApp functionality on Apple devices * be8f7e561853365ab14645d6b867c3173624cf76 Fixed: Overly aggressive exception release group parsing * c9743448fd950e93fbe0757588742f4967487e7d Configurable URL Base setting for Kodi connections * 47e647ddb10190ba9a272931ff9b483a3f0b7bd5 Fixed: URL Base setting for Kodi connections * f6529d5ad3059a6bd1f4430cec47d257ec0e0bc7 New: URL Base setting for Media Server connections * fb1b7274d029dff5e87a58c57cb1858f38447bda Queue Manual Import commands at high priority * 33b12a532c8483a61a5de9d9ec77c9269ab643d3 Fixed: Don't disable IPv6 in IPv6-only Environment * cea5ee503fcb64895d21623d38dfe522e6975f7c New: Add download directory & move completed for Deluge * 475590a21bf2d09b06e9cfce25b44f695e08f8ed Bump version to 2.2.2 * 0ca0f68af1786c726af06b16462b25c29b33df6a Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 2c19b5aa61dfb146fbe0b295d0c2fe8ecc1d9e97 Ignore spotify mapping test more temporarily * 7e0c5e0da53a1edd8cdb914a46e69db52b548a5d Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * adecb7f73c05836c7bc2792738e625b28be620ba Increase migration timeout to 5 minutes * 98a90e2f8f6860253cd8a85434502231c43470f0 New: Bypass archived history for failed downloads in SABnzbd * ce2bb5be1ff9b88abb1c9a48d4c5a9121811bb14 Update caniuse-lite * e446c25a0196d7121bbd86216287caac84c7520f New: Options button for Missing/Cutoff Unmet * d38c101acda907604db8349f66faf89d0f00b8cb Fixed: Multi-word genres in Auto Tags (#4601) * 022fbf864cc2c64b1204eaadf03490ab47432286 Fixed: Selection of last added custom filter [ #4627 ] * 3ff9b8bd8546e0260a9a1c3e37ba31d57ec58e71 Bump version to 2.2.1 * 57926a61d27e0fbb02f7e1a3f90bfba71f3bd294 Bump node to v20.x on builder * 87f88af7eeda585a47a26b8ddd1fb2b25a3be0c2 Update name for errors with metadata API * 30fc3fc70af8619891cb134464566999fc96e855 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 4abca0c896aee6101e1e6b42516310193f2cd170 Fixed: Don't die on album deleted notifications with the artist already removed * b2f595436bed03ad86ddb79d109ac3f5c1c41a9b Improve messaging on indexer specified download client is not available * e7ae0b9e22605c6f661163a01ccbbfb0999385df Fixed: Refresh tags state to clear removed tags by housekeeping * 0431b257e1f7707b178f104fad5291fe619b52c5 Show download client ID as hint in select options * 479e8cce2050bbead6a681e728fc14215bb8de97 Hints for week column and short dates in UI settings * 27723eb3ea212765b95f4d1e42ab9f22312867a6 Revert "New: Preserve replaygain tags" * 616b529c9a99c43fd41cba1e9fedadc420c9d422 Fix CalendarPageConnector import sort * 8b85d4c941e5fc3b1fc8f0f3c6be83658e58c942 Translate Frontend Utilities [ #4096 ] * f13b095040f10776dbc2cab77c39cc5d3f9407ec Automated API Docs update * a4af75b60cdc531c2280d994a1ef1141bb7c830e New: Calendar filtering by tags [ #3658, #4211 ] * c7faf7cc25d94d0a1d3fa2c0b27d00afe7f775db Bump version to 2.2.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Lidarr/43582661-9ac3-4ec6-9583-209885d5ff34/_release?releaseId=77&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 2.3.3.4204
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.

Changes:

  • febb3ef4858efef549377b2c3f54b3479f88bec8 Bump Npgsql to 7.0.7
  • 30d9891bf0ee4dd126cb5a4211cd85c68c9156c0 New: Optionally use Environment Variables for settings in config.xml
  • 2621acdae5a5a9f1e32924e444d018388344dfd4 Minor translations to album interactive search
  • 18772553f2ba285f8d6c750a086b7261f7880a8a Fallback value for statistics
  • 0300bf2dd28b52b40ee404348b0bd3b03730851c Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 77861e4303783d7c62d96db55448d26f87d6b901 Refactor PasswordInput to use type password
  • 3545a7451e4ba9c8eba4229fedfb24492a01c5af Fixed: Text color for inputs on login page
  • 9f8c4530cabc761e84d1c6006bd29d7bb8191b2d New: Dark theme for login screen [ #4798 ]
  • 9da690f807b3476b86cb6b3b7a1d11a8fa243104 New: Support stoppedUP and stoppedDL states from qBittorrent [ #4795 ]
  • 31f342b8ad370cf7ba4f3a07cf80303d7c441c48 Use number input for seed ratio [ #4802 ]
See More * 596a36d45ff8444fbe9dad0a182c154be5f2ea62 Fixed: Notifications with only On Rename enabled * 94bb8a436b88dde3ceef191f7052e7d055d8b47d Fixed: Parsing long downloading/seeding values from Transmission * 94d2a20b6a79306fc3075d5dd9ad3c6dee4f39a9 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * a25e5aae1094f5158a8afe0a1a61cdd1ac637ad0 Fixed: Indexer flags for torrent release pushes * f4a02ffc838ae9336082c6b65cf2f6ba37e47394 Forward X-Forwarded-Host header * 1bdcf910146d2088b1a4f349fff65dd4c80ac587 Bump version to 2.3.3 * 4d28d3f25a5465c421b1d9161c8841015626001c Fixed: Initialize databases after app folder migrations * 9660ec37cd7756b8026a9c4597fc8fffec853a42 Use newer Node.js task for in pipelines * 66c7521f4b0baf7a6086246a28c497acd5f25120 Fixed: Limit titles in task name to 10 artists [ #4777 ] * 8b57b33c9912537c4606f90756c1e89bcc6f7e9c New: Don't initially select 0 byte files in Interactive Import [ #4776 ] * 580e4becbe6cab467960f966a42328929909c25c Fixed: Improve paths longer than 256 on Windows failing to hardlink * 5f248aa25ea9acf40685a2f1d621a982bb8bafae New: Remove qBitorrent torrents that reach inactive seeding time * a735eccb6503eb540e3797a4c3ddae88554f46c3 Bump version to 2.3.2 * d11ed42830a8ec2e926b4cd5936ea04a69396cc3 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * b0038dd1437e779ce49481e414251ef31247e6ae Fixed: Retrying download on not suppressed HTTP errors * 2e242aeb7baad9b5229c9eaa64eb2cddc6d6930f Database corruption message linking to wiki * 416d50531636f23a1243e24b89891d4858b432c7 Bump dotnet to 6.0.29 * 4816f3525628c977f488a9d5f969be5e353f2350 Bump typescript eslint plugin and parser * e42e0a72ebab124b6fab8db2039ae76420d434a4 Add dev container workspace [ #4756 ] * db9e62f79d4374755764ca2a248dd8a466f01c76 Convert store selectors to Typescript [ #3937 ] * bc69fa48420edf45da27aac2e7ce6d13496098b4 Bump frontend dependencies * 86dad72c494ffd82150cea3dd260c3f7aa378cc3 Bump version to 2.3.1 * 4a8d6c367d979ed3ade634682035e8671ee9b672 Bump skipping spotify tests * c1926f8758cdb222fd7861ff591a2943c36e729b Fixed: Skip move when source and destination are the same * 7820bcf91f65992cd1e4e1f81c00091d2dbf3cc8 Bump SixLabors.ImageSharp to 3.1.4 * 431ad0a028720461b351fe46054568b0437d86b1 Automated API Docs update * 59cf7a95c38283d68b944397f5ac576780b9d2b4 Fixed: Re-testing edited providers will forcibly test them * e17e3633f88b6cf36878f6a8dd9231629adbd8d4 Don't block task queue for queued update task for Rescan Folders [ #4551 ] * 46da2b49c6df6a0e78c2570e976db5adefe35e96 Bump version to 2.3.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Lidarr/43582661-9ac3-4ec6-9583-209885d5ff34/_release?releaseId=84&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 2.4.3.4248
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.

Changes:

  • 4d693f78f3be72a87dfb17bab1d5d5e34061ec0c Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 2dec783272409799fced8d7c2260e1bb5781ba51 Fixed: Creating root folders without default tags [ #4898 ]
  • 9045dea5364ff8a0677adc25e478e908e6b0ee11 Update SonarCloud pipeline versions
  • 2ad7396f6db5c2dfcb9e5b584f92650567cabb43 New: Added UI for parsing release names
  • bcfabacbd47f7205ce0d5abfaacefeffacfdfa48 Bump version to 2.4.3
  • bfcbb67054d0664bb334188ed309ef0bdea7984f Fixed: Already imported downloads appearing in Queue briefly [ #4877 ]
  • bc19ead182dc06678ce51152bb64ccf72d8681d8 Bump version to 2.4.2
  • 39a5abd5ae867a6c58590ae56bc504b703b4454a Bump skipping spotify tests
  • e31f2ad2536fd0ab868a9a22f3bf0c2c0b8a37f4 Fixed: Validate metadata and quality profiles for root folders
  • 838e49ba232e6535cb56acbd4fcff69dd20e1bc6 Bump mac image to 12
See More * 47b5bbc9e1e7867d747b7449ba8f7b6091daaaa4 Fixed: Exclude invalid releases from Newznab and Torznab parsers * d602f38b7d1fc7e09f4d74a8fd245928f8e0e811 New: Ignore Deluge torrents without a title * e8ab1f842b1168ba7605357a58bfb3fd82e5470f Bump version to 2.4.1 * 959f6be019c05d65ff272c2c65f854eeef5d4001 Ignore `Grabbed` with STJson [ #4824 ] * ceca76d7c078291adbcabe43d48b96f35c227be0 Automated API Docs update * 3b0f9500a882f6e1d30b2a36f56e026246cd195a Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 9eda077c03ad7933974811fb573beb420a57a939 Ignore `Grabbed` from API docs [ #4847 ] * 4832860cce89cb019fb05d79b6bf2226e97ae8d0 Rename Sonarr to Lidarr * 448d29f1352cc5b05df4735cf8c33bbec5d3e1a8 Fixed: Improve error messaging if config file isn't formatted correctly * 7d46360c34ab7c9897cacb9cbd23f47ab54f68ef Fixed: Ignore case when resolving indexer by name in release push * 4752b54e26978c6eadbd1ea05c950941c8f3c2b9 Fixed: Ignore case for name validation in providers * 17bf73d1ef4aa3180ad9fb7e238c3f373b75b8da Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 6ec298ed2a9653863b8cea33e7174d50d37b5fcc Fixed: Trimming slashes from UrlBase when using environment variable * 563db9231eb0a8053f8dc890d44a246d48d964d6 Update the wanted section for missing and cutoff unmet * d27b062d6acb86832b3f564d838bd2762865aec7 Bump version to 2.4.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Lidarr/43582661-9ac3-4ec6-9583-209885d5ff34/_release?releaseId=92&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 2.5.3.4341
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.

Changes:

  • 1dee2aaf808d65021750e6c0baff89245fd597a8 Fix tests
  • f024dad65f6288c66ff98b28f07bd086a7e29097 Bump workflow actions
  • ef3b644d52a81f92666e7bddf6b61d35fb19b8a2 Fixed: Update English Localization reference to Movies (#5061)
  • af4eeeb8931f1148d10254507a6eea86da754ba7 Don't persist value for SslCertHash when checking for existence
  • 7738ee78c81ad68cb8d5ed8b34945e065269fc61 Automated API Docs update
  • 8d3dc0a470707fd6df0d7d18bd55cc0ef690b641 Validation for bulk series editor [ #4983 ]
  • 2b8b8ed147c76d6fa1b5078d4ca0f3712824369e New: Configurable log file size limit [ #4982 ]
  • 828e04bcadf474614739207e8f7876e8035d28c9 New: Add Compact Log Event Format option for console logging [ #4981 ]
  • bb6528c104ecb722e85b8f5f74d8f64dd6a967aa Upgrade nlog to 5.3.3 [ #4980 ]
  • f49388f3c4e78f776a729285050e4c46c79735ff Fixed: Ensure Root Folder exists when Adding Artist [ #5041 ]
See More * 8ff8c27e24113b178ab65386d847d66260e51b1e New: Root folder exists validation for import lists [ #4820 ] * 281bcb28fe967bb240310b0334edd97d8c2e3d5b New: Configure log file size limit in UI [ #5023 ] * e60a21967112ddc5cb22ff7ee953639b6f722f1b Bump babel packages [ #5025 ] * 34ac9dbfcbe2580cc0bbf43d15973789151808fa Use autoprefixer in UI build [ #5024 ] * 30ceb776159e4cb07ba197d2cdb774b03f8fd053 New: Bulk manage custom formats [ #5050 ] * 304646f324234ecbecfc8fcef36daed5c9db2291 Fixed: Hide reboot and shutdown UI buttons on docker [ #5048 ] * 75551419619f0329bd1125b9185b80c69dad2a39 Fixed: Trim spaces and empty values in Proxy Bypass List [ #5044, #5045 ] * df09e903d4c7aeed21986725da8a39d28fe13043 New: Bypass IP addresses ranges in proxies * 88f4c0c6cd65d5129fe12a7e66821239d018a407 Fix disabled style for monitor toggle button * 8f9281f91438e5e04211a273a78c7597a6964b85 Updated code action fixall value for VSCode * 5fed16c38a91a8a85b1aae87feb952029c1bb5dd Fixed: Limit redirects after login to local paths * 963ffbea4ec53f1134dcaf8009d4ba3b23952da5 Bump version to 2.5.3 * b514de2840f80bd6a18c9fc706ef58883b120292 Revert "Fixed: Stale formats score after changing quality profile for artists" * 6673d14eddcb4e9f6e2cd47890dd62ec89651b14 Fixed: Duplicated changelog lines * da954dc31e6ddbb934b271db533c8605c0b5a33a Align queue action buttons on right [ #4989 ] * 51d22bed2a19fc244d3f3320d34305f731e149e9 Include available version in update health check [ #4949, #5000 ] * 04e0d3f22e9cb9aedd19c2c8a4602f686388898b Skip duplicate import list exclusions [ #5003 ] * 809db4022e062211091afe0cffa8469b246d2aa2 Fixed: Persist selected custom filter for interactive searches [ #5006 ] * afbead8a88efbf150ac427f15c5522efa7bc5d7f Fixed: Stale formats score after changing quality profile for artists [ #5009 ] * 950e94564e2e89a40cb286e4abcf26414a222a4b Sort quality and metadata profiles by name in custom filters [ #5010 ] * 790e1233ec2468916fc50c7c4b7df577c4a5fa97 Bump version to 2.5.2 * b259136d3f2bce6f1d8492b59805744373f5aa13 Add indexes for albums statistics * 54607eb2e07bc7b66db32354313d36e7b47643be Cache root folders for artist paths * 07b3ebb1aa73fecbaeb9633a7ebeba964d625b70 Fix typos and improve log messages * 1ec1fc4c67e55705c386159513d7be98887f5d61 Fixed: Overwriting query params for remove item handler (#7075) * 36e67fdc2e6c91c9cc28f2a87774a27b9eb0b6d1 Fixed: Removing invalid statuses on provider deletion * 916fbb2a69e908fdb648d4c30d2503645c458132 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 4904e52c95946cb4d5c1d89fde76d0351b099d3f Don't hash files in development builds * 49f452a958db8e1f198329da21b289662fe0d1de Fixed: Interactive Import dropdown width on mobile * 6ef3a0a6d40fcf226eae2ec96e0b6592e54f75d8 New: Return downloading magnets from Transmission * 683f690a859b92e2d9eab5fc1a99f0b1ef441cb4 New: Default file log level changed to debug * 0216f46b378713b6c6d999715946413f6e65b561 Fixed: Moving files for torrents when Remove Completed is disabled * d2bd9b48492ee240253f31e4acf6fc4c966d31ec Improve messaging for renamed track files progress info * 70e524409c7a7e825f024b097e5235f047264bd7 Bump ImageSharp to 3.1.5 * 3a3c19fb7706029faf9c1ac76d7ad1054aaf8437 Treat forcedMetaDL from qBit as queued instead of downloading * c6362cb47a732fbb22c4367156d180305038f2d8 New: Ignore Litestream tables in Database * cb7e3987a9ecf699d8a91201a3b05b4d3db6bab3 Bump version to 2.5.1 * 328d089d929b42991f81de9a58881ca591cc84c2 New: Bump dotnet to 6.0.32 * ffa21676530e37d12d195a930a2494ce75e81dcd Fixed: Selecting a root folder in add new artist modal * e2e4a94a9f6db23d1e17054c04f9a38f18a54d26 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * fb75b28cb18b4a00db7fbd5fdae2266ac999cc30 New: Show update settings on all platforms [ #4919 ] * 7f73a2e23aa57696c0fb11cd05e6e8badfd21bd6 New: Use natural sorting for lists of items in the UI [ #4912, #4921 ] * a9dd947eedaac750c451b3fab79951d8f38e659e Remove extraneous indentation in RemoveFileExtension * d845d73130df4b7e5a16a7ecae6ce9ce594d5978 Fixed: Assume category path from qBittorent starting with '//' is a Windows UNC path [ adarr/Radarr#10162 ] * 2328611472a341c2e339f43907d9cdcc2c2b0176 New: Wrap specifications in Custom Format and Auto Tagging modals * 95609913270e0b8678be5c848292d03a2f2e03e8 Fixed: Removing pending release without blocklisting [ #4892 ] * ed07f82218dcde4b4b20db4fc3a4bfc01be29c60 Fixed: Linking Next/Last albums for bulk edit artists * 633feaa02342b646277557610e78133c7eb1aeaf Fixed disable options for SelectInput * 56679861a01232a5881a81d0a7593c452452b04f Mapping `ArtistMetadataId` is needed for last/next monitored albums * a52c6f6f41bff9b76a34085aca01a1a709bdf62d Fixed: Display last/next monitored albums for artists * eb04673040e9a320c038f7c5be798b34cba7d1d4 New: Include with files in album group info * 30e681e84336a1656ab66586cd82a21c8b340465 Fixed: Refactor artist statistics * 19f824dbd8bce56ba91a96800ef1dd54a5fcc098 Bump version to 2.5.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Lidarr/43582661-9ac3-4ec6-9583-209885d5ff34/_release?releaseId=97&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 2.6.4.4402
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.

Changes:

  • 0e9a5fbd04a605ff1d639c32ba3936b1cc1a3fdc Automated API Docs update
  • f3cd49a2dadd4028f0643e5e3e5082efea2277f8 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 1a74118d6bf4264ee81455872fd46adcec589ce4 New: Use 307 redirect for requests missing URL Base
  • 9850823298ea49fa2373ef0917cde43121a3ff6f Fixed: Error updating providers with ID missing from JSON
  • bd7d25f963b27153655bf5ea1258e02c78bc440e Fixed: Sorting by title and release dates in Select Album modal [ #5145, #5125 ]
  • 3a5012655e94d5cc927c3be3dd82ee0661c50325 Bump macOS runner version to 13
  • ba55a4778aa86e66cf94ade8280ffcaa71b20729 Bump version to 2.6.4
  • ff91589f735ecf093dd201202b5fcbf0af3d4c52 Automated API Docs update
  • 2caba01123d7585817c32b190365d2f85d7e8366 Fix tests for nested artist folders
  • 4588bc4a7e9809cfa735068128020a6e19588a6d Fixed: Manual importing to nested artist folders
See More * 3381ffc311f10029d387b84ee356390b682f0bcb New: Last Searched column on Wanted screens (#5084) * f705603211d6ddbf9a4eb430844644db06c792d8 Updated .gitignore to remove duplications and add '_temp*' (#5142) * 715274bcc7d489346faafc4cbb89d64a1151bffe Improve indexer name for RED * 9b063aa291a698b6f1eed620ba9ad27cb8e2159b Bump version to 2.6.3 * af4ff004768800440de3c06af8aa7bd2b1f4cdcd Fixed: Telegram log message including token * b14c647c86b3276ee44b82309f227d4328559572 Display naming example errors when all fields are empty * 00cca22dc7957a6475331836e6e0f31ae6616b50 Fixed: Adding individual albums for existing artists * 73fddd5201c6bf7e8663a950800debc91040c2f3 Update license reference * b7e5a745a1e4e9279a302f4bac7176d3af1a7376 Bump version to 2.6.2 * b67533bccff38bed0a138a55e10732ce9750193b Automated API Docs update * 21d9ecccd6a409fad8881fe81d75f9e5f1ddd100 Fixed: Improve validation for individual album adding * 34c9300cbf8958a4dc56143775324a88aa56104b Fix description for API key as query parameter * 3e5af06622bf84e543374cbc3a1fe2547b5f8d94 Fixed: Unable to login when instance name contained brackets * ccce4f5cc0d43888c28fc771dba6febfff05bba4 New: Show warning in queue if download contains executable or archive file and no audio file was detected (#5106) * 5947b4642c65f7541d8e808254440e645cd8392d New: Check for available space before grabbing [ #5095 ] * 856ac2ffa5344b9d2fb0f54a12abf935b8bad9ca New: Add exception to SSL Certificate validation message [ #5103 ] * b2a4c75cce80ad763d691d04bd8d47b0e59ab753 Fixed: Refresh tags after updating autotags [ #5093 ] * 2818f4e0732edeef63cd271875a88e663194fbef New: Use instance name in forms authentication cookie name [ #5102 ] * 60fe75877b7d0e5b554a9957a64117c934788443 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 2170ada8a2db9595834c559abb97cc574c823892 Fixed: Linking autotags with tag specification to all tags * c26c0d5bd6352470bb4bd0ad89c5cc9ae9beefb3 Bump version to 2.6.1 * d17c6a9b3e5dcf62d86cffe9d347452c54f2c1e8 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * af6c0cc6f5c33e91a5239b41acfa282049141037 Display secondary types on album details * 21344361e4964d79db04d7a29762051cf5134941 Add weblate widget * 8efb6025310152291ddd73ce3945994aa0df512b Multiple Translations updated by Weblate *
